entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Donald Trump delayed action to protect Americans from Coronavirus infection.  The results are devastating.  We Americans lost our income and future to this virus and Presidency.  Donald Trump had neither the temperament or the vision to run the federal government.  We were wrong!
